title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate code delivery: Dev containers and Amazon Q Developer  (SPS324)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速代码交付：开发容器与 Amazon Q Developer (SPS324)
abstract: Explore advanced integration patterns between development containers, Amazon Q Developer, and validation tools to accelerate AWS infrastructure development. Through live coding, learn how containers enable consistent AI-assisted coding while automatically implementing security controls and quality gates in your IDE. See practical examples of container-based validation tools and discover how this approach transforms development practices. Leave the session with hands-on experience building secure, high-quality AWS solutions integrating AI and container technologies.
abstract_cn: 探索开发容器、Amazon Q Developer 和验证工具之间的高级集成模式，以加速 AWS 基础设施开发。通过实时编码，了解容器如何在 IDE 中自动实施安全控制和质量门禁的同时实现一致的 AI 辅助编码。查看基于容器的验证工具的实际示例，并了解这种方法如何改变开发实践。离开会议时，您将获得构建集成 AI 和容器技术的安全、高质量 AWS 解决方案的实践经验。
